name: generateGlyphs(for:desiredNumberOfCharacters:glyphIndex:characterIndex:)
desc: Generates glyphs for the specified glyph storage object (NSLayoutManager by default).
declaration:
func generateGlyphs(for glyphStorage: NSGlyphStorage, 
desiredNumberOfCharacters nChars: Int, 
         glyphIndex: UnsafeMutablePointer<Int>?, 
     characterIndex charIndex: UnsafeMutablePointer<Int>?)
